channel.title: No 474+ board?
channel.description:
Why?
The 317 revision differs in so many ways from 474, much less 503, 508, 525 and so on. They don't belong in the same category.

item.title: No 474+ board?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

In future post your suggestions in this thread, but I see you have basically found your answer to it anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: No 474+ board?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:8, topic:324154”]it’s all rs2 emulation, it doesn’t matter

plus the mods would have to always check up on each section and make sure kids aren’t posting in the wrong sections, etc.[/quote]

still, most people help out in help section because they only code 317s, then there is a number of posts of 474+ and never get answered…

Read full topic

item.title: No 474+ board?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:5, topic:324154”][quote author=Rich link=topic=420556.msg3089348#msg3089348 date=1262748238]

A new engine section will not be released until someone can provide a server worth using. If you know of one, then please tell us.

[/quote]Only one of the worst ideas I’ve heard of. That’s just being stuck-up =[/quote]

It will be more efficient because all the noobs that flood into the section will be using something worth using besides some piece of garbage they found laying on the side of there ass-crack.

Read full topic

item.title: No 474+ board?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Because adding a new board would make too much sense. Apparently, there aren’t going to be any forum edits until it upgrades to 2.0, and plus it takes a month for tons of staff members who really don’t give a shit on what gets added here to even benefit us to vote on it, from what I heard.

Read full topic
